section.title: Your feedback is vital
section.para: If you believe the JBoss Documentation Guide can be improved in any way, we want to hear from you!
Please submit a documentation issue using the JIRA tracking system against the project &PRODUCT; and the component &BOOKID;.

If you have a suggestion for improving the documentation, try to be as specific as possible when describing it. If you have found an error, please include the section number and some of the surrounding text so we can find it easily.
